detail_desc: Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.
Tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with satin shawl lapels, a single button at the front, flap front pockets and a decorative chest pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
